a.title: School District's Vision
a.div: In partnership with educators, family and community; Skagway School District will provide rich and rigorous academics that ensure all students will succeed in their education and work. Click this block to link to Board Goals.

div.div:
SSD uses Remind to send out information about school activities. This is a program that allows us to send messages to your phone as a text message. If you would like to join our remind group go to www.remind.com and create an account.
Enter this code into the Class Code bar: @skagways

img.div: Click this block for a narrative about local artist Beau Dennis and his artwork. Beau Dennis is an aspiring Northwest Coast formline artist focusing on acrylic painting on vellum and canvas. Born in Juneau, Alaska in 1981 and raised in Skagway, Alaska, Beau has shared ancestry from the Tlingit, Haida and Scottish peoples

img.div: Adalia and Sadie auditioned and earned a spot in the Region V, Honor Fest 2019 Choir. Their auditions included learning and performing two Major Scales in tempo, a Chromatic Scale and the singing of America the Beautiful, all on pitch and a capella. The securing of a spot in the Honor Choir gave them the opportunity to learn under Dr. Eklund, Professor of Music, from the University of Nebraska and have the powerful experience of singing in a choir with 150 vocalists.

p.span: Skagway School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
